# Loops and control
  - if else
  - for
    - counters (sets)
    - "growing" results
    - debugging
    - break, next

## if/else

```{r}
x <- 10

if(x > 5) {
  x <- x^2
}

if(x > 5) {
  x <- x^2
} else {
  x <- x^3
}

if(x > 5) {
  x <- x^2
} else if(x > 3) {
  x <- x^3
} else {
  x <- x - 1
}
 
y <- TRUE

if(y) {
  hist(rnorm(1000))
}


```

## for loops

```{r}
mydf <- data.frame(x = rnorm(n = 1000, mean = 2, sd = 1), groups = rep(1:10, each = 100))



```
